Hero.description: Stop trading quality for speed. We fuse <white>Generative AI</white> velocity with <white>Senior Engineering</white> rigor to deliver secure, scalable software in weeks, not months.

Ecosystem.title: The Agency Operating System
Ecosystem.subtitle: Three powerful interfaces connected by one intelligent core.
Ecosystem.clientDesc: Generate specs with AI, track real-time progress, and deploy instantly. No more emails.
Ecosystem.squadDesc: Pick up missions, access clear specs, and submit code. Get paid for output, not hours.
Ecosystem.adminDesc: The central brain managing quality control, payments, and system integrity.

Comparison.title: Why Choose a Hybrid Agency?
Comparison.subtitle: The future of software development is AI + Human collaboration.
Comparison.old1: Hours of Zoom meetings with no clear outcome.
Comparison.old3: Progress updates must be requested via WhatsApp/Email.
Comparison.new1Sub: Briefing via AI Chat in 10 minutes.
Comparison.new2Sub: Price locked by the system at start.
Comparison.new4Sub: One primary point of contact forever.

ProductCatalog.title: Ready-to-Use Solutions
ProductCatalog.subtitle: Choose the package that fits your business needs.

ops.title: Business Ops Dashboard
ops.desc: Turn Excel piles into secure internal database apps. Automate salary & commission calculations.

publisher.title: The Publisher Engine
publisher.desc: Super fast Next.js news portal with modern editorial CMS. Ready for ad and subscription monetization.

saas.title: Custom SaaS MVP
saas.desc: Validate your startup idea in 14 days. AI builds frontend, I build backend.

Workflow.title: No Drama. No Meeting. Direct Action.
Workflow.subtitle: Efficiency of asynchronous workflow for maximum results.
Workflow.step1Desc: Tell your idea to our AI. It will prepare a neat technical specification (PRD) yang rapi untuk Anda.
Workflow.step2Desc: The system calculates feature complexity and provides a definite Fixed Price. Pay secure deposit via Midtrans.
Workflow.step3Desc: See progress on dashboard. Need revisions? Just click the part you want to change. I do the work, you receive the result.

Financial.title: Save Cost, Not Quality.
Financial.subtitle: Smart investment logic for modern business.

Guarantee.title: We Take the Risk for You.
Guarantee.subtitle: 100% Money Back Guarantee on Briefing Phase
Guarantee.desc: We are very confident in our hybrid system. If after the AI briefing session and receiving your initial Blueprint you feel our approach isn't a fit, we return your deposit 100%.
Guarantee.footer: No questions asked. No drama. You still get to keep the AI-generated Blueprint analysis.

Expert.title: One Human Brain, Supported by Machine Intelligence.
Expert.q: Many clients ask: 'Is the code made by robots?'
Expert.a: Answer: AI is the bricklayer, I am the Architect.
Expert.desc: I use AI to eliminate boring work (boilerplate, CSS, admin), so I can focus 100% on business logic, data security, and your app's performance.
Expert.footer: The result? Enterprise Agency quality, with Freelancer speed and price.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.q1: Can I really not chat directly?
FAQ.a1: Our platform is designed for efficiency through Asynchronous communication. Everything is neatly recorded. But for emergency situations or deep strategy consultations, Premium Call sessions are available.
FAQ.q2: What if there are bugs after completion?
FAQ.a2: All packages include a 30-Day Bug Warranty. Report via dashboard, fixes are prioritized.
FAQ.q3: Do I own the source code?
FAQ.a3: Yes, 100%. After final payment, the GitHub repository will be transferred to your account.

Overview.aiHelperDesc: Our AI Systems Engineer is online and ready to help you scope your next mission.

Integrations.title: System Integrations
Integrations.description: Connect GitHub and Vercel to enable automated workflows, deployment monitoring, and code synchronization.

Finance.title: Orders & Invoices
Finance.description: Comprehensive archive to track payments, invoices, and project estimate statuses in real-time.

Footer.ctaTitle: Ready to Build Your Business Future?
Footer.copyright: © 2024 Crediblemark. Built with Human Intelligence & Artificial Speed.
